question.questionB: Holophytic plants with green leaves.
Flowers not spurred, yellow or brown.

question.questionA: Flowers with a spur (sometimes short and sac-like).
question.questionB: Flowers without a spur.

question.questionA: Length of labellum more than twice that of rest of perianth.
question.questionB: Length of labellum less than twice that of rest of perianth.
Spur cylindrical (> 1 mm wide).
Spur > 5 mm long.
Upper 5 tepals incurved as helmet.

question.questionA: Middle lobe of labellum < laterals; leaves unspotted.
question.questionB: Middle lobe of labellum > laterals; leaves usually spotted.

question.questionA: Middle lobe of labellum not exceeding lateral lobes.
question.questionB: Middle lobe of labellum exceeding lateral lobes.

question.questionA: Middle lobe of labellum equal to laterals.
question.questionB: Middle lobe of labellum much shorter than laterals.

question.questionA: Middle lobe of labellum divided into three.
question.questionB: Middle lobe of labellum dentate but not divided into three.

question.questionA: Stem 15 - 45 cm; Flowers violet; Spur half the length of the ovary.
question.questionB: Stem 7 - 20 cm; Flowers white/pink; Spur equal to or longer than ovary.
Labellum flat, neither velvet-haired nor insect-like.
Outer perianth pink/white/yellow, petaloid.
Labellum entirely or almost entirely non-reflective.

question.questionA: Labellum longer than broad with notched elongated central lobe.
question.questionB: Labellum more or less ovoid.
Labellum distinctly shorter than sepals.
Sepals pink.

question.questionA: Labellum curved up at end, blue shiny patch near tip.
question.questionB: Labellum straight or reflexed, lacking patch near tip.
Labellum rounded, margins not distinctly coloured.

question.questionA: Flowers c. 1 cm across, spirally arranged.
question.questionB: Flowers more than 1 cm across not spirally arranged.
Labellum distinctly constricted into a basal part witha distalunlobed lip.

question.questionA: Flowers reddish brown, labellum downward pointing, elongated, tongue-like.
question.questionB: Flowers white or purplish, labellum forward-pointing, only as long as broad.
Labellum equal to length of perianth.
Flowers stalkless; ovary twisted.

question.questionA: Leaves ovate; bracts longer than ovary.
question.questionB: Leaves lanceolate; bracts shorter than ovary.
